company.name: Matrix.itasoftware
company.text: ITA Software is a travel industry software division of Google, that provides services like search by airport code, city and explore date ranges and lowest fares

company.name: Adioso
company.text: A website that provides services to find cheapest and best ticket's flights

company.name: Hotels.
company.text: Expedia is a tourist reservation website govern by Expedia Group. The website can be used to book fly tickets, accommodation reservations, cruises, rent a car and vacation tours. It uses internet booking engine for reservation and finding items. It has very well customized but the rank is not good as well as its competitors.

company.name: Airbnb
company.text: Airbnb is a company which operates an online marketplace and hospitality service for people to lease or rent short-term lodging including holiday cottages, apartments, home stays, hostel beds, or hotel rooms, to participate in or facilitate experiences related to tourism such as walking tours, and to make reservations at restaurants

company.name: Trivago.
company.text: Trivago's hotel search engine has websites in 50+ countries, Trivago's search tool scans hotel booking sites for prices, availability, images and reviews within seconds. When users choose a hotel, they are redirected to a partner website to complete the booking

company.name: Homeaway
company.text: HomeAway, is a vacation rental marketplace with more than 2,000,000 vacation rentals in 190 countries. It operates through 50 websites in 23 languages. The company offers a comprehensive selection of rentals for families and groups to find accommodations such as cabins, condos, castles, villas, barns and farm houses

company.name: tripit
company.text: All your travel plans, in one place Get a master itinerary for every trip

company.name: rome2rio
company.text: Discover how to get anywhere by plane, train, bus, ferry and automobile

company.name: weather2travel
company.text: Find the best holiday weather Where to go on holiday plus how to save with exclusive discounts

company.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
company.text: "The CDC collects and publishes health information for travelers in a comprehensive book, CDC Health Information for International Travel, which is commonly known as the \"yellow book.\" The book is available online and in print as a new edition every other year and includes current travel health guidelines, vaccine recommendations, and information on specific travel destinations. The CDC also issues travel health notices on its website

company.name: Travelrol
company.text: The first tourism social media

company.name: Expedia
company.text: Expedia is a tourist reservation website govern by Expedia Group. The website can be used to book fly tickets, accommodation reservations, cruises, rent a car and vacation tours. It uses internet booking engine for reservation and finding items. It has very well customized but the rank is not good as well as its competitors.

company.name: Booking
company.text: Booking is a travel meta search engine for lodging reservations for Accommodation, Flight, Taxi and Restaurant. It has provided in 43 languages, the main goal is to provide room reservation in many countries and it is one the famous and practical websites, also it governs some other famous tourism websites. It has also provided information for destinations and clear view of customer feedback.

company.name: Tripadvisor
company.text: TripAdvisor is a we travel website company providing hotel and restaurant reviews,  accommodation bookings and other travel-related content. It also includes                             interactive travel forums

company.name: kayak
company.text: Search hundreds of travel sites at once."

company.name: Wikivoyage.
company.text: Wikivoyage is a free web-based travel guide for travel destinations and travel topics written by volunteer authors. It is a sister project of Wikipedia and supported and hosted by the same non-profit Wikimedia Foundation

company.name: Travellerspoint
company.text: Travellerspoint is a social networking site for people who want to learn from or share experiences with other travelers. Members of the site participate through forums, blogs, photo galleries and a wiki travel guide, similar to Wikivoyage

company.name: 101holidays
company.text: More than 4 million people a year visit our sites to research their holidays, using the expertise of our team of award-winning travel writers

company.name: Opentable
company.text: OpenTable is an online restaurant-reservation service. The service allows users to search for restaurants and reservations based on such parameters as dates, times, cuisine, and price range. The service provides restaurant owners with comprehensive reservation management

company.name: Yelp.
company.text: Yelp's website, is a crowd-sourced local business review and social networking site. Its user community is primarily active in major metropolitan areas. The site has pages devoted to individual locations, such as restaurants or schools, where Yelp users can submit a review of their products or services using a one to five star rating system.

company.name: Spottedbylocals
company.text: City guides with insider tips by locals in 71 cities!

company.name: Rentalcars
company.text: A car rental, hire car, or car hire agency is a company that rents automobiles for short periods of time, generally ranging from a few hours to a few weeks. Clients search, book and pay for hire cars on Rentalcars.com, and the bookings are fulfilled by car rental companies

company.name: Easytaxi
company.text: Easy Taxi is a mobile E-hailing application available in 30 countries. The app allows users to book a taxi and track it in real time

company.name: Skyparksecure
company.text: Excellent secure airport parking at unbeatable prices, with unrivaled customer service

company.name: Gadventures
company.text: G Adventures has defined small group travel for over 25 years. Travelling with us is the very best way to get up close and personal with your planet in a way you’d never manage on your own

company.name: contexttravel
company.text: Small Group & Private Tours Expert-led walking tours in over 47 cities worldwide.

company.name: Tourradar
company.text: TourRadar is a travel website where travelers and tourists can schedule a group tour, as well as featuring user-generated reviews of individual tours and of the Tour Operators.

company.name: ToursByLocals
company.text: ToursByLocals was one of the originators of the \"peer to peer\" travel model. The company initially focused on the basic function of connecting travelers with local guides via an online platform, relying on peer reviews to establish quality control measures

company.name: Getyourguide
company.text: GetYourGuide is a website where tourists can book activities such as tours and excursions, and buy tickets to numerous other tourist attractions

company.name: Seat61
company.text: The website focuses almost exclusively on train-based travel, with occasional ferry recommendations
